Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Reports in news media suggest that people are anxiously waiting for the Federal Budget with various opinions and proposals being shared. The Federal Opposition calls for spending restraint while energy and clean energy investments are a top priority for the Government. The Treasurer faces resistance from the oil and gas industry for potential tax hikes. There's also talk of legislative changes required to the RBA's operations. Meanwhile a proposed multipurpose stadium in Hobart has been met with mixed opinions. Finally the people can work out which health fund is the best option for them with a potential annual saving of around $400.
